summary.Title: Warehouse Workers for an attractive job in Herning
summary.JobHeadline: Warehouse Workers for an attractive job in Herning

For our customer in Herning (H. I. Park) - one of Denmark's largest logistics companies - We’re currently seeking Warehouse Workers for long-term temporary job

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse Workers for an attractive job in Herning
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Jobnr. 170872

For our customer in Herning (H. I. Park) - one of Denmark's largest logistics companies - We’re currently seeking Warehouse Workers for long-term temporary jobs, at their busy warehouse.

You will be part of a large and dynamic team, where a good atmosphere, good working environment, and team spirit are framing the working day. You’ll become part of a fast-paced environment, so you can look forward to some active working days with exciting assignments.

You and your team's primary task will be emptying freight containers and sort packages. Other ad hoc work will occur. It is not a requirement that you have a truck certificate, but it is an advantage.

We can offer you a long-term temporary position of up to 18 months, and there is a good chance for permanent employment afterwards.

Your profile

We are looking for employees, who thrive with an active workday and enjoy work in a fast-paced environment along with a good sense of order. You have previous experience from a similar position, enjoy working with active tasks. Furthermore, you can work independently in a structured and efficient manner.

Working hours and wages

There are available jobs on both the day- and evening shift:

Day shift: 07.00-15.30.

Evening shift: 15.00-23.00.

There is the possibility of a quick start-up.

Hourly wage: DKR. 153,69

Evening supplement (After 18.00)

Weekend supplement

Are you interested?

If you’re interested in applying for the position, we recommend that you send your application immediately.

We’re looking forward to hearing from you.
